title: Acupuncture | Alternative Medicine | Natural Remedies
description: Acupuncture for pain relief, stress relief; pain management; whiplash; stomach aches; nerve pain; sciatic pain, sports injuries; treatment for anxiety
cleaned_text: Acupuncture Acupuncture is both an ancient and modern healthcare methodology. Simply put, it works to alleviate pain and boost the body's natural responses to inflammation, hormonal imbalance, posture misalignment, illness and infection. Julien Wellness treats patients with two primary techniques: Very gentle Classical Chinese acupuncture and for our orthopedic patients, a contemporary sports/orthopedic style called Motor Point Acupuncture. By integrating these two methods we directly address pain and alignment imbalance while boosting your body's natural healing capabilities. In addition to recovery from pain or dysfunction, patients experience a very noticeable reduction in daily stress and improved sleep. If you've never experienced acupuncture before, you're going to love it. The treatments are pleasant and gentle but generate obvious improvements in specific body systems and
